body:
Honestly, after playing Avicus for so long, I really thought I came across one of my most favorite matches of Avicus ever a few minutes ago. This match had a great gameplay, great tactics I've never seen before, and it adapted so well to where this was the first match ever for CTF and it played as if OCN defenders were on it. We had 2 separate defenses, and the front lines were pretty great... loving the concept and I posted it on trello. Hopefully it gets accepted by the other mapdevs!



I'll of course, work out the bugs with drops/wool placement and see if I can fix stalemating, but just wanted to post about it. Great match, and any further development of this map would be excellent imo.

title: Very fun Boolean match :)

replies.body: Yes this is a very nice map and gamemode. Can't wait for further development. Also, next build contest may be confirmed for CTF. Hype!
